attributes.action: Limit child benefit payments to 2 children per family (introduced after a suitable time frame)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Many families are producing far too many children and claiming benefits because (they claim) they are too busy to work and earn an income.
There has to be a limit, say 2 children per family, after which benefits cease.
Why should Mr Average pay for those who cannot control themselves?
For those families which already have more than 2 children, benefits should continue as now but not increase when more are born.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
